titles: Dauids musick: or Psalmes of that royall prophet, once the sweete singer of that Israel vnfolded logically, expounded paraphrastically, and then followeth a more particular explanation of the words, with manifold doctrines and vses briefly obserued out of the same. By R.B. and R.A. preachers of Gods word in Somersetshire.
author: Bernard, Richard, 1568-1641.
R. A. (Richard Alleine), 1611-1681. aut
notes: R.B. = Richard Bernard; R.A. = Richard Alleine.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
keywords: David, --  King of Israel --  Early works to 1800.
Bible. --  O.T. --  Psalms I-III --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
